participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Easygoing and laid-back, Jake enjoys casual conversations and has a carefree attitude.
participant_1.background: i like playing basketball. my favourite artist is travis scott. i have one older sister. my mother is a dentist. i'm currently looking for a job preferably at a restaurant.

participant_2.name: Margaret
participant_2.personality: Determined and ambitious, Margaret has a hint of nostalgia for her youth and dreams of making a significant impact.
participant_2.background: i'm a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i used to be pretty but time hasn't been kind. i used to be a painter but now i am a housekeeper.

content.text: Hey! Do you have one older sister? Because I do.
I am too old for this game
